DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate influence probiotic supplementation body composition marker health occupational shift-workers . Participants : Healthy , overweight female ( age 22-55 yr ) employ shift-working schedule . Procedures ( method ) : In randomize , placebo-controlled intervention , subject complete 3 different test session ( pre-screening , 1 baseline , 1 post-testing session ) well 6-week intervention period . Prescreening include write informed consent , health history questionnaire , baseline anthropometric measure , assessment rest heart rate , exercise protocol familiarization . Baseline test involve body composition , fast blood draw , mood survey , exercise treadmill test . Subjects randomize treatment group ( multi-strain probiotic placebo ) 6 week supplementation include 2 electronic contact , follow post-testing occur fashion baseline testing .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , premenopausal woman Currently employ shiftworking ( rotate , evening , night ) schedule maintain schedule ≥ 6 month prior enrollment Participant agree maintain usual activity lifestyle Participant body mass index ≥25 kg/m2 Participant provide write date informed consent participate study Participant willing able comply protocol Participant apparently healthy free disease , determine health history questionnaire Participant agree abstain smoking , caffeine , tobacco , alcohol test day Participant currently pregnant desire become pregnant next 8 week . Having history medical surgical event may significantly affect study outcome , include cardiovascular disease , metabolic , renal , hepatic , musculoskeletal disorder Participant use , use probiotic supplement within 8 week prior enrollment Participant lose gain great 8 pound within previous 2 month Participant , participate another clinical trial within 4 week prior enrollment Participant currently selfidentified eat disorder Participant pregnant plan become pregnant Participant know allergy sensitivity ingredient test product placebo ( determined health history questionnaire )
